name: policy

ip_version.description: Filter: Traffic IP Version. [ ipv4 | ipv6 ], if left empty, will retrieve data for both ipv4 and ipv6.

GET.summary:
List traffic statistics for firewall policies.
Access Group: fwgrp.policy

help: List traffic statistics for firewall policies.

bytes.name: bytes
bytes.title: Bytes
bytes.description: Bytes of traffic affected by this policy.

packets.name: packets
packets.title: Packets
packets.description: Number of packets affected by this policy.

last_used.name: last_used
last_used.title: Last Used
last_used.description: Timestamp of when the policy was last used.

first_used.name: first_used
first_used.title: First Used
first_used.description: Timestamp of when the policy was first used.

hit_count.name: hit_count
hit_count.title: Hit Count
hit_count.description: Number of times the policy has been used.

session_first_used.name: session_first_used
session_first_used.title: Session First Used
session_first_used.description: Timestamp of when the first session was established.

session_last_used.name: session_last_used
session_last_used.title: Session Last Used
session_last_used.description: Timestamp of when the most recent established session was destroyed.

software_bytes.name: software_bytes
software_bytes.title: CPU Bytes
software_bytes.description: Bytes of traffic processed by this policy with software.

software_packets.name: software_packets
software_packets.title: CPU Packets
software_packets.description: Number of packets processed by this policy with software.

asic_bytes.name: asic_bytes
asic_bytes.title: SPU Bytes
asic_bytes.description: Bytes of traffic processed by this policy with the SPU.

asic_packets.name: asic_packets
asic_packets.title: SPU Packets
asic_packets.description: Number of packets processed by this policy with the SPU.

nturbo_bytes.name: nturbo_bytes
nturbo_bytes.title: NTurbo Bytes
nturbo_bytes.description: Bytes of traffic processed by this policy with nTurbo.

nturbo_packets.name: nturbo_packets
nturbo_packets.title: NTurbo Packets
nturbo_packets.description: Number of packets processed by this policy with nTurbo.

cgn_last_used.name: cgn_last_used
cgn_last_used.title: Hyperscale SPU Last Used
cgn_last_used.description: Timestamp when the policy was last used for hyperscale SPU accelerate.

cgn_first_used.name: cgn_first_used
cgn_first_used.title: Hyperscale SPU First Used
cgn_first_used.description: Timestamp when the policy was first used for hyperscale SPU accelerate.

cgn_hit_count.name: cgn_hit_count
cgn_hit_count.title: Hyperscale SPU Hit Count
cgn_hit_count.description: Number of times the policy has been used for hyperscale SPU accelerate.

oversize.name: oversize
oversize.title: Oversize
oversize.description: True when the number of addresses used by the policy exceeds the maximum number supported by the system.

1_week_ipv4.name: 1_week_ipv4
1_week_ipv4.title: Firewall Policy IPv4 Weekly Statistics
1_week_ipv4.description: List of the last week of IPv4 traffic statistics for a firewall policy.

1_week_ipv6.name: 1_week_ipv6
1_week_ipv6.title: Firewall Policy IPv6 Weekly Statistics
1_week_ipv6.description: List of the last week of IPv6 traffic statistics for a firewall policy.

response_description: List traffic statistics for firewall policies.

ip_version.name: ip_version
ip_version.summary: Filter: Traffic IP Version. [ ipv4 | ipv6 ], if left empty, will retrieve data for both ipv4 and ipv6.
